tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training

Class LinearTesting

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training.LinearTraining
      • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training.LinearTesting
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearClassifier, Test, Test, Test, Test_de, Test_de, TestCoarse

    public class LinearTesting
extends LinearTraining
    Testing Class that is extended by all linear testers. Offers methods to test Models by classifying documents and storing the labels.

      • classifyTestSet

        protected static void classifyTestSet(java.lang.String inputFile,
                                      de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Model model,
                                      java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> features,
                                      java.lang.String predictionFile)
        Classifies a file containing the test set using a Model. Stores the original labels and the predictions in a file for evaluation.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - corpus containing the test set
        model - linear Model
        features - Vector of FeatureExtractors
        predictionFile - path to the output file to store the predictions

      • classifyTestSet

        protected static void classifyTestSet(java.lang.String inputFile,
                                      de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Model model,
                                      java.util.Vector<FeatureExtractor> features,
                                      java.lang.String predictionFile,
                                      java.lang.String type)
        Classifies a file containing the test set using a Model. Stores the original labels and the predictions in a file for evaluation.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - corpus containing the test set
        model - linear Model
        features - Vector of FeatureExtractors
        predictionFile - path to the output file to store the predictions
        type - the type of the problem: relevance, sentiment or aspect; used for internal evaluation
